name: My First Halloween Shooter
description:
Update: Added music/sounds!

Controls:
Arrows, WASD or ZQSD : Move
Left click : Shoot

Only 1 mode for now so please choose Mayhem, hoping to add the other one later. Try and reach 1000 points :)
If the game gets laggy after that in browser, try the downloadable Windows version.

I just started learning GameMaker Studio 2 on the day this jam started, so I decided to turn my first tutorial into a bigger game and give it an Halloween theme. Hope you enjoy it!

Thanks to : 
cazwolf for the pumpkin
angrysnail for the tileset
blambot for the font
chiptunistchippy and cool-cat-game-studio for music
ellepasnom for the player sprite
